channel.title: Prabhat Pandey
channel.description: A collection of Prabhat's writings, thoughts, and artistic works reflecting his inner world and creative spirit.

item.title: Exploring .git folder
item.description: Git was my valentine this year. I finally went deep inside .git and got to know it a lot better.

item.title: Of Dogs and Walls
item.description: Collection of two short stories by Yuko Tushima. The first story is 'The watery realm' and the second story is 'Of Dogs and Walls'.

item.title: How Trying to Be the Best Was Holding Me Back
item.description: A reflection on perfectionism after I challenged myself to draw.
